description: Faced with Israel, the Islamic Republic of Iran can no longer count on its allies in Lebanon, Iraq and Yemen, which have been weakened since Hamas's attack on Israel, on October 7, 2023.

Europe's paradoxical support for Israel's attack against Iran
description: France, the United Kingdom and Germany expressed their support on Friday for Israel's 'right to defend itself' against the nuclear threat posed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, despite deteriorating relations with Benjamin Netanyahu because of his war in Gaza and their stated preference for a diplomatic approach.

headline: Thomas Piketty: 'Opponents of the tax on the ultra-wealthy lack historical perspective'
description: After France's Sénat voted against a 2% wealth tax for people whose worth exceeds €100 million, the economist argues that the scale of France's debt and funding needs for social and climate challenges will soon require even more radical redistributive measures.

headline: French actress Anouk Grinberg: 'My soul was born with my son'
description: The French actress, who became an advocate for women who have filed complaints against actor Gérard Depardieu, discusses her suicidal mother and how she found emancipation when she became a mother herself.

headline: Artificial intelligence consumes massive amounts of energy. Here's why
description: From developing models to their everyday use, generative AI has proven to be extremely energy-hungry. Le Monde breaks down the reasons behind this voracious demand, as their user base continues to expand.

headline: Two Jewish sisters' fight to honor the couple who hid them during the Holocaust
description: Arlette and Madeleine Testyler campaigned so that Jeanne and Jean Philippeau, who sheltered them during World War II, be recognized as Righteous Among the Nations. After some hesitation from the mayor, the town of Vendôme is organizing a ceremony on June 16 in which they will be honored by the Yad Vashem Institute.

headline: War in Ukraine: Russia steps up its offensive in the Donetsk region
description: Seizing complete control of the region − nearly one-third of which remains under Ukrainian control − has been a primary goal for the Kremlin. The arrival of summer has made it easier for Russian forces to advance.
